Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Today in the ninth of the Hebrew month of Av, known in Hebrew as Tisha B'Av, it is a day of mourning that commemorates the destruction of the two Temples, The first temple was destroyed by King Nebuchadnezzar in the year 586 BCE, Rebuilt again 68 years later, it was destroyed again in the year 70 CE by the Roman Emperor Hadrian, Both temples were destroyed on the 9th of Av, The day is a fast day that unfortunately has many bad memories for the Jewish people, It was also on this day 498 years ago that the expulsion order of the Jews was made in Spain, It is also a day to remember the 6 million Jews who died in the Holocaust, even though there is a special day set aside for this apart from the 9th Av, Religious Jews feel that the fast will be set aside when the whole of the world is at complete peace with each other in a messianic age.

metadata.label: Title

sequences.label: Today in the ninth of the Hebrew month of Av  known in Hebrew as Tisha B'Av  it is a day of mourning that commemorates the destruction of the two Temples  The first temple was destroyed by King Nebuchadnezzar in the year 586 BCE  Rebuilt again 68 years later  it was destroyed again in the year 70 CE by the Roman Emperor Hadrian  Both temples were destroyed on the 9th of Av  The day is a fast day that unfortunately has many bad memories for the Jewish people  It was also on this day 498 years ago that the expulsion order of the Jews was made in Spain  It is also a day to remember the 6 million Jews who died in the Holocaust  even though there is a special day set aside for this apart from the 9th Av  Religious Jews feel that the fast will be set aside when the whole of the world is at complete peace with each other in a messianic age.
